      • getCommand

        public java.lang.String getCommand(java.util.Scanner scan)
        This gets the user's input for the command, being deposit, balance, withdraw, or exit
        Parameters:
        scan - Accepting scanner as a parameter allows scanner to be opened and closed only once
        Returns:
        Returns a string value of the user's input, which is their command

      • deposit

        public void deposit(java.util.Scanner scan)
             throws java.io.IOException
        The deposit method is what appends a positive value to the HTML file
        Parameters:
        scan - Accepting scanner as a parameter allows scanner to be opened and closed only once
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception for input error
